scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The apartment building located at 959 Park Place in the Crown Heights neighborhood of Brooklyn was sold to Katy Equities Corporation on September 29, 1967. These records, dated 1965 to 1968, pertain to that sale, as well as negotiations between the Tenants' Association and Katy Equities concerning rent payments, painting, and general maintenance. The records include flyers, receipts, correspondence, notes, programs, and tickets for the tenants' association, as well as materials related to the association's youth committee and their efforts to renovate the building's recreation room.
